sense.def:
To relish something
pomeni, da človek ob nečem občuti veliko zadovoljstva.

seg.quote: He relishes the challenge of competition.
In his book he exposed with relish all the evils of our present day.

sense.def:
To relish the idea or prospect of something
pomeni z veseljem misliti na nekaj, kar se utegne zgoditi.

cit.quote: veseliti se česa, uživati ob misli na kaj

seg.quote: She didn't relish the idea of going on her own.
